page.title: 15VALE OF CLWYD RURAL LEISURE.
page.content: {Tourists}:Apart from some holiday homes tourists do not seem to play any part in local life, we found no one offering bed & breakfast or farm holidays. One person had tried letting a holiday cottage but had given up because it was too complicated. {Footpaths:}There are several footpath in the area which are in good condition & regulary used by rambling groups & individual walkers. {Horse-riding}:The local pony club go on treks, picnic rides & paper chases in the area in groups of 20 children with 2 or 3 adults.There is also a local riding stables{.Ploughing {matches. Sheepdog trials}.Although these do not always take place within the block there is keen local interest and participation in both ploughing matches and sheepdog trials.
